report.title: Blurred PoMS results mapping
report.description: All PomS results for map. Includes blurred location data. Note this will only work on BRC Live Warehouse as I had to include hard-coded survey IDs 636, 637, 638, 641
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.survey_id in ( #public_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_pan_traps_survey_id#,#fit_count_app_survey_id# ) AND csf.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST('#year#' || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST('#year#' || '-12-31' as date))) AND (CAST(csf.survey_id AS character varying) = '#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='')

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: public_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the public fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_pan_traps_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km pan traps survey.

param.name: fit_count_app_survey_id
param.description: ID of the fit count app survey.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.lookup_values: 636:FIT Count,637:FIT Count 1km,638:1km pan traps,641:FIT Count App

column.name: sc
column.sql: case csf.record_status when 'C' then 'blue' when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then '#800000' else 'black' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case csf.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then '#800000' else 'blue' end
